caseTitle: M/s M.A. International thr. its Proprietor  Lahore v. The Appellete Tribunal of Customs, Excise & Sales Tax thr. Collector of Customs Karachi & others
tagline: The transfer order of Mr. Muhammad Tanvir, Dy. DG, DRAP has been withdrawn and the grievance of the applicant apparently seems to have been redressed. Accordingly, the application filed by Mr. Muhammad Tanvir stands disposed of.
